author: mkirsano
body:
#### PR description:

The new plugin produces HepMC3 products. For the moment only GEN step can be run like this.

#### PR validation:

Local tests using the new configurations in /test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

title: Add to Pythia8Interface the plugin that uses HepMC3
